com.aimon.game.view.game.inputprocessors

Class DesktopInputProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.InputAdapter
      • com.aimon.game.view.game.inputprocessors.GameInputProcessor
        • com.aimon.game.view.game.inputprocessors.DesktopInputProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor

    public class DesktopInputProcessor
extends GameInputProcessor
    InputProcessor for Desktop case: This class is only called when the Running Platform is Desktop.
